page.title: 14 Gas Comes to Shipton
page.content: For the first time ever Shipton people will be able to choose between gas and other fuels because the Gas Board have brought gas to the village so we sent out a questionnaire asking if they wanted gas and if they thought gas was safe etc.Slightly over \ the people we asked wanted gas.Approx.3/4 of the people thought gas was safe 3/4 thought gas was easier to use than other fuels.Some people wanted gas because it is cheaper to run more efficient and convenient, people also liked it because it is cleaner and provides heat immediatly and is more reliable.But some of the people who wouldn't like it say it is expensive to install,dirty,harder to use and is dangerous.
